name: Edison/Oberlin Pen Company Roller Ball
description:
This is a limited edition roller ball pen of 9 pieces ONLY!

This first Oberlin Pen Company pen is a collaboration with the Edison Pen Company of Ohio.  It is crafted from high quality acrylic.


Specifications (Approximately): 
Cap Diameter	.610" 
Body Diamater	.610" 
Length Capped	5 3/8" 
Length Uncapped	5"


The total price for the pen is $200 US.
IMPORTANT - California sales are subject to California Sales Tax.  If you are in California please contact us so that we can send an invoice for the total with sales tax.

SHIPPING NOW!  STILL TIME FOR CHRISTMAS DELIVERY!

name: Edison/Oberlin Pen Company Fountain Pen
description:
This is a limited edition fountain pen of 14 pieces ONLY!

The fountain pen will be available with your choice of Fine or Medium nib.  If you would like a broad or italic nib please let us know and we'll see what we can do.  The pen fills with a converter for bottled ink, or can use cartridges if you prefer.

This first Oberlin Pen Company pen is a collaboration with the Edison Pen Company of Ohio.  It is crafted from high quality acrylic, and the nibs are from the well known JoWo company of Germany.

Specifications:

Cap Diameter	.610"
Body Diameter	.610"
Length Capped	5 3/8"
Length Uncapped	5"


Fine and Medium nibs available.  If you would like a broad or italic nib, please let us know.

The total price for the pen is $250 US plus shipping

IMPORTANT - California sales are subject to California Sales Tax which will be added to the balance payment along with shipping costs.

NOW SHIPPING!  STILL TIME FOR CHRISTMAS DELIVERY!
